title: SVG fonts
summary: When SVG was specified, support for web fonts was not widespread in browsers. Since accessing the correct font file is, however, crucial for rendering text correctly, a font description technology was added to SVG to provide this ability. It was not meant for compatibility with other formats like PostScript or OTF, but rather as a simple means of embedding glyph information into SVG when rendered.
